thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com | 2 of 84
thread.title: Danny Kunimura

author: Danny Kunimura
title: Danny Kunimura
text: Nutrisystem is a very effective and easy weight-loss program. I have used it multiple times over the past 10 years with great results. However, the non-frozen foods are not that great and at times, unpalatable, especially the dinners. The new frozen entrees are okay. If it weren't for the frozen foods I would not be doing Nutrisystem now or ever again.
